Donations

Making VFX-animation videos and developing softwares that are free and open source, in hopes to provide both high quality entertainment and technical solutions to everyone without charge, is my highest form of passion. However, with current economic disparities, my focus are ultimately divided between these two and my IRL software dev job.

With the rapidly declining opportunities on my local area and how dev jobs here pay no better than minimum living costs and education fees, I decided to reach out for support on the international platform.

Doing just either one of VFX-animation videos or software dev takes a huge amount of time and effort. This is the chance in which hopefully, through this donation, I can eventually make this my full time job. Not just a job, but it's one I will never retire from.

Patreon Ko-fi Liberapay
